short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Power BI Accessibility Checker for Visualizations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables users to run an accessibility checker on Power BI reports. This checker focuses on identifying accessibility issues in Power BI visualizations. Users should install this to ensure that their reports are compliant with accessibility standards and to provide a better experience for report readers.
